commit message:
Merge pull request #45 from precla/master

Updated croatian translation (from @precla)

Added WhatsApp's official repository to the update sources (fixes #44).
Added a settings option to disable background checks over mobile data (fixes #43)
Fixed a problem with Play Store pages which don't display version information anymore.
Added more protections against AppBrain's fake version numbers.
Bumped F-Droid to the top of the sources.json list (#41).
Hopefully, better alphabetical ordering for strings with accented characters (#39)

BUGFIX: app list is now refreshed before background checks (fixes #42)
BUGFIX: spinner icon didn't start properly on Lollipop.

Merge pull request #48 from DJaeger/master

Added german translation (from @DJaeger)
Began the work on a search bar for installed apps (#38).

Added Firefox Aurora and Nightly to sources.json

See #52

Merge pull request #53 from DJaeger/master

Added Firefox Aurora and Nightly to sources.json (from @DJaeger)
A search bar that allows users to filter withing the app list has been implemented (fixes #38).
Downgraded AppBrain to non-secure HTTP to avoid CloudFlare capchas.

Merge branch 'master' of github.com:JusticeRage/ApkTrack
